Andy Coulson one degree of separation to the McCann affair: McCann family spokesman Clarence Mitchell joins CCHQ as head of media monitoring for the election www.prweek.com PR Week has the story: The Conservative Party has signed up Clarence Mitchell , best-known as spokesman for Madeleine McCann's parents, as the head of media monitoring for its general election campaign, PRWeek can exclusively reveal. " Clarence Mitchell joins the Tory comms operation today, reporting directly to director of communications Andy Coulson . Clarence Mitchell , who was the director of the Government's media monitoring unit for two years( 2005-2007) will take a back room role, monitoring the progress of the Tories' campaign in the media. Clarence Mitchell , a former BBC News presenter, is a member of the Conservative Party in north London and also Home Secretary Theresa May says the Government will wait for the outcome of the police phone hacking investigation.. Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are "very routine" for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings.___
